SEARCH
Package com.example.namesplitter.api

Schnittstelle APIService

Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
RESTService
@RequestMapping("api") public interface APIService
This interface defines the API endpoints for the name parsing service. It includes methods for parsing names, managing titles, saving structured names, and checking the service status.

  • Methodendetails

    • parse

      @PostMapping("/parse") APIResponse parse(@RequestBody String name)
      This method parses a given name into its components.
      Parameter:
      name - The name to parse.
      Gibt zurück:
      An APIResponse containing the parsed name and any errors.

    • getTitles

      @GetMapping("/getTitles") List<TitleData> getTitles()
      This method retrieves all academic titles.
      Gibt zurück:
      A list of all academic titles.

    • addTitle

      @PostMapping("/addTitle") boolean addTitle(@RequestBody TitleData title)
      This method adds a new title.
      Parameter:
      title - The title to add.
      Gibt zurück:
      A boolean indicating whether the title was successfully added.

    • removeTitle

      @PostMapping("/removeTitle") boolean removeTitle(@RequestBody TitleData title)
      This method removes a title.
      Parameter:
      title - The title to remove.
      Gibt zurück:
      A boolean indicating whether the title was successfully removed.

    • save

      @PostMapping("/save") StructuredName save(@RequestBody StructuredName name)
      This method saves a structured name.
      Parameter:
      name - The name to save.
      Gibt zurück:
      The saved name.

    • status

      @GetMapping("/status") String status()
      This method returns the status of the service.
      Gibt zurück:
      A string indicating the status of the service.
